SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Offer Acceptance Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Offer Acceptance Rate is Job Satisfaction

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Offer Acceptance Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Offer Acceptance Rate is Skill Proficiency Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Offer Acceptance Rate, is the point for Stewart, Mcmahon and Scott inside or outside the point for Smith LLC?
SRP.A: On the Offer Acceptance Rate, the point for Stewart, Mcmahon and Scott is inside the point for Smith LLC.

VPR.A: label {Offer Acceptance Rate} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Smith LLC?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Offer Acceptance Rate}, while the weakest aspect is{ Pay Equity Ratio}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Pay Equity Ratio, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Pay Equity Ratio, label {Smith LLC} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Job Satisfaction, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Job Satisfaction, label {Stewart, Mcmahon and Scott} scores the lowest.

MSR.A: Stewart, Mcmahon and Scott most needs to improve its {Job Satisfaction}.
